structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases
Search Warrants, Rewards, Fugitives From Justice, Arrest, Examination, Commitment And Bail. Probation Officers And Board Of Probation

law.catch_line: Restitution In Cases Involving Motor Vehicle Theft Or Fraudulent Claims

text.section: providing for additional time to make any payment in restitution;
reducing the amount of any payment in restitution or installment thereof;
granting a remission from any payment of restitution or part thereof.
